name: Color My Sweet Little Princess
description:
Color My Sweet Little Princess Coloring Book is an exciting coloring and doodling game. This coloring pages book offers endless bright and interesting themes, beautiful colored paint brushes, unique marker pens to unleash creativity several times. When someone draws whether boys or girls, adult or all age, they paint or doodle, they creates their own special world.

Come enjoy the fantastic, beloved and fun coloring app for your princess! With the amazing coloring pages and beautiful brushes, your little one is guaranteed hours of fun to free their endless imagination.

Colored pages of princess, unicorn, dragon, castle and all other creations both get stored to device photo gallery after procedure is complete. all ages, adults or even granny can paint anytime and draw brilliant masterpieces.

Features:
- 100+ beautiful princess and fairy coloring pictures.
- 60 beautiful brushes
- Zoom-in and zoom-out for detailed coloring.
- Paint with tips of your fingers.
- Bright colors and FREE beautiful illustrations.
- Friendly tools for both Adults & all ages (colored pencils, markers, fun stickers).
- Awesome family game.
- Simple and nice design, easy to use.
- Snapshots of your coloring pages can be saved in your photo album.
- Funny Sounds.
- Amazing coloring app for everyone worldwide
- Tons of beautiful coloring pages
- Simple and nice design family app, easy to use

It is the time to have fun with our wonderful Princess Coloring game!
